channel.title: Posts on CyberWinter
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CyberWinter

item.description: Summary Today we’re doing Busqueda from Hack The Box. It’s supposed to be an easy machine but, for me i think it’s much more of a medium one. The web server on this box is based on Flask (Python), and while these tend to be vulnerable to SSTI and code execution, it was a bit hard to craft the right payload, after getting a foothold on the box, User was straight forward, Root has many misleading routes, but with a good wide enumeration, you’ll find your way in.
